page.name: Unit 4, Section C Overview: A Closer Look at Inputs and Outputs
page.content:
Mr. Das has been interested in how batteries work and how to make them last longer since he was a boy. Now he is using that interest as a PhD candidate at MIT to produce longer-lasting batteries, which can cut down the impact on the environment. He can use functions to help him analyze energy inputs and outputs as he studies battery power and efficiency.

In this section, you will take a closer look at the input and output of a function. You will learn to identify the domain, inputs, and range, outputs, of a function based on context and graphs.

This section includes 2 lessons:

  • 4.11 Domain and Range, Part 1
  • 4.12 Domain and Range, Part 2
